title: Educational Insights Kyro5
description: Place, replace, and race to 5.  Be the first to place a row of 5 pyramids—touching on any side or corner—and you win this tricky, hieroglyphy game of wits and strategy.  Ages 7 to Adult The nitty-gritty:• Includes 24 pyramids (12 blue and 12 green) and pyramid storage tower• Encourages strategic thinking• For 2 players
